tests.sic.sST.poisson

Class ssPlusDTCpoissonBoxed

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.sic.sST.poisson.ssPlusDTCpoissonBoxed
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, FunctionIntf

    public class ssPlusDTCpoissonBoxed
extends java.lang.Object
implements FunctionIntf
    the class works as the class sSTCnbinBoxed but the arguments are s, D (representing the difference S-s) and T, which allows for specifying the constraints 1 ≤ D ≤ Dmax directly on any meta-heuristic optimizing the function sSTCnbin. As in the sSTCpoissonBoxed class, the function evaluations are cached for fast lookup.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2021

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Constructor Detail

      • ssPlusDTCpoissonBoxed

        public ssPlusDTCpoissonBoxed(double Kr,
                             double Ko,
                             double L,
                             double lambda,
                             double h,
                             double p,
                             double p2)
        sole public constructor, simply calls the constructor of the base class.
        Parameters:
        Kr - double the review cost
        Ko - double the ordering cost
        L - double the lead-time
        lambda - double the rate of the demand arrivals in a time unit
        h - double the holding cost per unit of items per unit of time
        p - double the penalty cost of back-orders per unit of items back- logged per unit of time
        p2 - double the penalty cost of lost-sales per unit of item

    • Method Detail

      • eval

        public double eval(java.lang.Object arg,
                   java.util.HashMap params)
        evaluates the (s,S,T) policy on the given parameters, projecting first the parameters back into the feasible region if needed. Fractional values for s and S are rounded into the nearest integer.
        Specified by:
        eval in interface FunctionIntf
        Parameters:
        arg - Object // double[]{s,S,T}, but also accepts DblArray1Vector
        params - HashMap unused
        Returns:
        double
